text:
In a special announcement on Thursday, producers Barbara Broccoli and Michael G. Wilson together with director Cary Fukunaga revealed that Malek along with other new faces Ana De Armas, David Dencik, Lashana Lynch and Billy Magnussen have joined Daniel Craig in his fifth and final 007 outings, reports hollywoodreporter.com.
Recently, they shot an ad together and fans were more than happy to see the Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani pair reunite!
3. These Happy Pictures Of Irrfan Khan From The Sets Of 'Angrezi Medium' Is Making The Internet Happy
Irrfan is currently in Udaipur for the shoot and everyday, the updates from the sets are making way on the internet.
Kamilla posted a screenshot of her boyfriend’s ‘list’ on Twitter. The list reads: “We will not be queuing to buy popcorn, please make prior arrangements. You are not permitted to consume and food during the film (including end credits)... I will not be moving to allow you to pass for a toilet break - find an alternative rule.”
Bollywood's 'Greek God' AKA Hrithik Roshan took to his Instagram account to share his journey after his ankle injury. The video is an important one because it doesn't just shows his endurance but shows his commitment towards health and fitness.
